tool_description: "Rev up your messaging game with the LightningChat API – the Usain Bolt of Golang APIs! 🚀 Send, receive, and manage SMS faster than ever before.
name: Go-Messenger
title: Go-Messenger

api_list.name: Read Single Message using user ID
api_list.description: read a message using user id.

api_list.name: Read All Messages
api_list.description: Read all messages of the user.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://go-messenger.p.rapidapi.com/messages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "go-messenger.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://go-messenger.p.rapidapi.com/messages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "go-messenger.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
